column4: hey, I got compiz running, but seems a little sluggish, and motion blur doesn't work. Does it not use hardware acceleration?
afaik compiz uses hardware acc if it's available.. what graphics card are you using?
and I installed the nvidia drivers and nvidia-setings tool
anywa way to check to see if its enabled?
run "glxgears -info" in a terminal.. look at the first couple of lines.. it will tell you what renderer it's using
sounds powerful enough.. compiz ought to be smooth and nice
glxgears doesn't seem to say anything about hw accel...
pastebin those first 5 or so lines
here's what it looks like on my computer http://paste.ubuntu.com/152408/
well, why do you think motion blur doesn't work...I assumed cause hw acc wassnt utilized
might be something else then.. from that output it looks like your graphics card is working nicely
you can try asking in #compiz-fusion , I think that's the channel for compiz support
